data.name: Raw Data - OST
data.detailed_description:
The Raw Data OST features the complete original orchestral soundtrack composed by Jeremy Nathan Tisser for Raw Data. Bonus tracks include new recordings of Chopin classics, the Eden Corp Jingle, and favorite scenes starring Simon, aNg3L, and Chairman Shiro.

Available in WAV and MP3 320 kbps formats.

Tracklist:

01 - Raw Data Main Theme
02 - "My Name is Simon"
03 - Welcome to Eden Corp
04 - Rigid Automo
05 - Dynomo Extinction
06 - "That Was Traumatic"
07 - Skybound
08 - Vapor Exploit
09 - Eden Nocturne in C minor (Ft. Chairman Shiro)
10 - QuantumOS
11 - Cataclysm
12 - "Welcome to Sector G, Eco Habitat"
13 - Teleshift
14 - The Attunement Chamber
15 - Watson Genomics
16 - "Reactor 1 Node D, Sector F Data Chamber"
17 - AdamX10 & Finale
18 - "Self Destruct Sequence"
19 - Eden Corp Jingle
20 - Eden Nocturne in C minor (Instrumental)
21 - Op. 27 Nocturne No.1 in C# Minor
22 - Op. 27 Nocturne No.2 in Db Major
23 - Op. 48 Nocturne No.1 in C Minor
24. Op. 55 Nocturne No.1 in F Minor
25. Op. 72 Nocturne No.1 in E Minor
26 - Raw Data Official Release Trailer

data.short_description: The Raw Data OST features the complete original orchestral soundtrack composed by Jeremy Nathan Tisser for Raw Data. Bonus tracks include favorite scenes starring Simon & aNg3L, the Eden Corp Jingle, and several classics by Frederic Chopin (also featured in Raw Data).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
